title: President Donald J. Trump Is Promoting Regional Prosperity And Security – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
November 30, 2018
My Administration is dedicated to securing human rights in Cuba and Venezuela, and strengthening our cultural and philosophical ties with all our Latin American partners.
						President Donald J. Trump					PARTNERING TO PROMOTE REGIONAL PROSPERITY: President Donald J. Trump is using the G20 Summit to work with partners to promote economic prosperity for the Americas.DEFENDING DEMOCRATIC VALUES: President Trump is standing up to authoritarian regimes across the region.ENHANCING REGIONAL SECURITY: The Trump Administration is working with allies to enhance regional security.
